website_summaries.verdict: Clunky looks aside, the Keurig Vue V700 offers the best value, and richer pod-based brews than other single-serve brewer in its price range.
pros: The Keurig V700’s responsive, intuitive, color touch screen offers a variety of brewing options and uses pods that are recyclable and large enough to make a decent cup of coffee
cons: It’s a big, bulky unit that will eat up a lot of counter space, and we’re not confident in the durability of its plasticky design

customer_reviews.title: It is hidden in the fine print that it doesn't use the k cup
customer_reviews.text: It is hidden in the fine print that it doesn't use the k cup, so I had to purchase a k cup insert for $16. which is a rip off. I used the k cup insert and now I have a massive amount of coffee grounds in my coffee. The vue cups are hard to find and when I do find them I they are expensive. Don't buy this if you want to use k cups.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, efficient, awesome coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love my new machine. Especially the fact that you can go from 4 oz to a humongous 18 oz travel mug beats any K-Cup machine. The selection of coffee and beverages is awesome, even if it might be a bit less than K-Cup (I think). Basic feature like Auto On/Off and temperature make it simple to use and convenient. For some reason, it took over 40 minutes to warmup the first time I started, making me think I had a DoA unit. However, maybe it was just cold from the shipping because once it went through, it was back to the normal 3-4 minutes of preheating. It's been a week now and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: dgiaffe

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best coffee
customer_reviews.text: The Vue coffee pot is exactly what I have been waiting for. It makes enough for one or a small pitcher of sweet tea for two. I especially like the sweet tea cups and the freedom of making a 10 ounce raspberry mocha for myself to enjoy on the way to work. I am an inexperienced coffee drinker. So the Vue has made it so easy to try a lot of different coffees and teas. I bought the Vue really with my husband in mind because it will brew 18 ounces of coffee at one time! Buy the plastic small pitcher also. It lets you brew over ice twice. (The brew over ice carafe)
customer_reviews.author: Janet E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brewer!
customer_reviews.text: I returned the V500, since I got the V700 cheaper on Amazon than the V500 in the department store. Pros: 1) Great tasting, like traditionally-brewed, coffee. 2) Coffee strength and volume are adjustable. 3) Temperature is adjustable, and can be very very hot if desired (ouch!). 4) Great-looking brewer! Cons: 1) Can not fit travel mug under spout. Keep in mind that most mugs can hold 14-16 oz, and if you get a giant mug, you can hold the full 18 oz. 2) Limited availability of Vue cups, but they are worth it, since the coffee quality is better than K-cups. (Keep buying this model, and the availability will increase).
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a simple a quick option that makes lattes
customer_reviews.text: My wife was looking for a option that was somewhat automatic and would make lattes. We looked at the Tassimo machines but the coffee is not widely available so we decided to go with the Keurig because it did everything and we can find the cups everywhere. The machine has been everything she has wanted and more we even found a reusable cup at bed bath and beyond that allows you to use your own coffee grounds which makes things nice. Everything the machine makes it makes well I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: djenvision

customer_reviews.title: Nice improvement
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier design of the Keurig and really liked it a lot. However, the ability to select cup size by description and quantity, rather than guessing from a picture and being able to choose a setting for how strong you want your coffee, how hot you want your drink and selection between making tea, coffee, hot chocolate, or other drinks is fantastic. This new design is a great improvement over an already super product.
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the regular Keurig as well, and this machine is so superior to it. I love how well it works! However, it is still loud. Just like the old Keurig models. Make sure when ordering this that you realize you can NOT use standard K-Cups with it. You have to buy the Vue cups or buy the filter for the Vue machine. WOrth the extra money, just because of all the different brew selections.
customer_reviews.author: Navem

customer_reviews.title: The machine works well but it is disappointing to not be able to just go to any store and get a gazillion flavors like you can w
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating that Keurig even sells this product when it is so difficult to buy the Vue pods. The machine works well but it is disappointing to not be able to just go to any store and get a gazillion flavors like you can with the K-cups. Personally I think Keurig owes us a rebate for this product.
customer_reviews.author: NMK

customer_reviews.title: Review of the Keurig Vue
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine a lot. The fact that the strength and temperature plus the volume of the beverage can be changed, all independently is I think a great advantage. With the re-usable cups, I can blend the coffee to suit my tastes. I unplug it at night, because even when turned off, the back of the machine opposite the water canister, stays warm.
customer_reviews.author: mishon

customer_reviews.title: Really good coffee without a mess
customer_reviews.text: This machine just make my day start a bliss. It delivers what it promises. Reliable coffee quality and no spills. It has been about 3 months and the spill collector is still dry. The area around is also very clean (I need to clean eventual drops once a week). I cannot tell how satisfied I am with it. One of the purchases for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Kuhn Andriotti

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $300
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one and half years. Waste of $300. Was blowing circuit breakers in my kitchen all of a sudden. Before that, the only bad experience was having to clean the unit internally often because of all the mineral buildup. And it was hard to find Vue cups anywhere. Had to buy them directly from Keurig. I'll never buy another Keurig. Very happy with my new Hamilton Beach.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas and she uses it every single day. So far we have not experience a single problem with the unit. She loves the convenience of making quick easy single cups. She's happy, so I'm happy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bloose

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I resisted these "cup" coffee makers but when it came time for a new coffee maker I opted to try the Keurig Vue. Love it! Choice of sizes of beverage and temperature and strength. And lots of beverage choice. And fast. Friends have been impressed. Only problem? So good I am tempted to drink too much coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Not a reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Now I can enjoy my weekend cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Meets my expectations. No long waits for a great cup of coffee or tea anytime. Got a few minutes? Got a great cup of coffee or whatever other hot beverage I want. Vue cups aren't in my local Starbucks yet but, I can get the Starbucks blends through Keurig. Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: JFO

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is awesome, I bought it for my hubby and anyone that we make coffee, tea cold or hot, cappuccino, hot chocolate, etc for, they say its the best cup of whatever it is they have they have ever had.. Love this machine so much we got my mom one also.
customer_reviews.author: Dichele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but I wish I had one of the newer models that uses all size of cups
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Lynn Cole

customer_reviews.title: Service was fast and the product was in excellent condition. I am loving the fast
customer_reviews.text: Service was fast and the product was in excellent condition. I am loving the fast, fresh coffee without having to make a pot that will sit for a long period before being finished.
customer_reviews.author: Troylene

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the price was so much lower than all the others we saw online. Well the old saying too good to be true applies here. It stated that is was new but in actuality is was used for demonstrations because we got it. It was not in the original box. It was wet and had coffee grounds inside the packaging. So they obviously we not able to get the water out of the reservoir because packaging it. It took a little cleaning up before we could use it but seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Janice K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: WARNING !, Becareful of the needles falling out into your cup of coffee!,
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Vue, in March of 2018. Last Sunday as my daughter was making a cup of coffee one of the needles fell into her cup , if she wouldn’t have been standing watching she could have ended up swallowing this and been life threatening. This needs to be addressed by Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: erin hill

customer_reviews.title: Favorite  Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: I was out of a coffee maker for 7 days drinking instant coffee. This is the 2nd Keurig Vue I have purchased and was so happy to get it. I am spoiled to single cup coffeemakers. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Susan Moehrig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cup of coffee! Love the ease and design. Difficult to find Vue cups - not as available as K-Cups. Bed Bath and Beyond is a good source if not ordering online.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dancy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product I like the design and being able to adjust temperature control I like the fact that I can choose what size cup I want I purchased the Kcup at Bed Bath and Beyond to use my own coffee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump is pooped out already!! Company makes good on warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on 10/15. Today, 11/30/13 , the pump mechanism quit working. I have been doing the regular cleaning of the brew head, and it has not been long enough to descale, as the booklet says do it every 3-4 months or so. For the money I spent, I would have hoped for a machine that did not poop out after one and 1/2 months of regular use. Waiting to hear from manufacturer as to what to do now. Sad, because I have been very happy with the coffee it produces... 12/3/13: Company was contacted..they are replacing my defective machine! Kudos to Keurig!
customer_reviews.author: Pooky

customer_reviews.title: jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product... for a little less than a month and then is unexplainably stopped working. The folks at Keurig were quiet helpful and said they would be shipping me a replacement. I don't have to ship the whole brewer back just the V-cup holder. The lady said to just stick my fingers down there and pop it out. The fun part is there are warnings saying there are share needle in the machine and not to stick ones fingers is there. Still not sure what I am going to do about this. The machine was very convenient and made good coffee
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffemaker
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this unit for the past month and I can nothing but good about the coffee maker. Easy to use, setup is quick, and the ability to brew different blends or hot chocolate within minutes is fantastic Highly recommend the VUE unit
customer_reviews.author: Hagsmtl

customer_reviews.title: low price keurig
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, i use it a lot, it was to me at a great price, it was $50 cheaper than in stores with shipping and that was when it first came out, shipping was prompt, it works great, definitely recommend this seller
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: The recipient is very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift. The recipient is very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: EKO

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to replace the one I received as a gift many years ago. It is a wonderful coffee maker
customer_reviews.author: Wendy D.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: Resisted buying a single serve coffee maker for a very long time. thought I could not survive without my 12 cup machine. A visit twith my son who had a Keurig K cup machine convinced me I needed to invest in my own Keurig. The Keurig is everything i hoped it would be and a whole lot more. I don't know how I would get along without it now . Richard Wall
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wall

customer_reviews.title: Use it at work
customer_reviews.text: Never tastes bitter, well worth the price! I have another brand at home that I paid almost 4 times the price and I like this one better!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Vail

customer_reviews.title: This is the best coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee maker, don't know why they discontinued it -Big Mistake - HUGE!!! So glad someone had the forethought to get a few ahead, worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: MOLLIE

customer_reviews.title: Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. It makes a great cup of coffee as long as you buy great coffee to go in it. One thing to be wary of, there are not many Vue cups available and they seem to very limited in retail stores. I use a Solofill V2 cup to use Kcups in it. Its not recommended and if you choose to do so yourself, I just recommend at least once a week, running a take of water through machine without a cup in it to help keep the jet clean.
customer_reviews.author: Psykonate

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Coffee maker is awesome. Nobody sells vue cups. Except the Internet and bath and body works
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Keurig as a birthday gift for my daughter. She loves it. My granddaughter loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rosalie M. Hoffberg

customer_reviews.title: Vue Cups
customer_reviews.text: I love the machine, I like a big cup of coffee, the only down side is I can't find the vue cups anywhere? It came with samples which I have used, and the ones I have from the old Kuerig do not fit in this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Griffin

customer_reviews.title: excelent
customer_reviews.text: This Keurig Vue is attractive, a larger water reservoir,and mine came with a water filter. The main characteristic of Keurig Vue is that it's completely programmable. Choose coffee/tea/hot chocolate mode Strength control - brew strong or regular coffee. Temperature control - brew a really hot or iced coffee. Size control - choose cup size that you like, the from 4oz to 18 oz. With new air-infusion you can create frothy cafe drinks.
customer_reviews.author: seansun

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Nespresso Machine last year, but I wanted something that could do more. The new V700 gave me that. Even though i can't find V-Cups at the grocery stores, it gives me an amazing range of options to choose from. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Felipe De Salmaso

customer_reviews.title: Great Product if you like treasure hunts.
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a 16oz travel cup coffee dispenser and found this one. I should have done more research on the "Vue" Cup system. The local grocery stores don't stock the "Vue" Cups and I have a cupboard full of K-Cup Coffees and Teas. I take part of the blame for NOT reading the reviews. If Keurig or Mr. Coffee came out with a "Travel Cup" sized K-Cup coffee/tea dispenser I'd be all over that like a pit bull on a ham bone.
customer_reviews.author: Sumdude

customer_reviews.title: Died 2 weeks later
customer_reviews.text: The reason for the 4 stars was Keurig's outstanding customer service. They immediately sent me a replacement brewer! This easily brews K-Cups with the after-market adaptor. The problems I have was with the water level sensor and it just stopped brewing. so 2 problems with the new unit. Hopefully when the replacement gets here it will be a good one. I would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaShopper

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this coffee maker. Just make sure you buy the adapter cup so you can use the regular Keurig cups also.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Golightly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine
customer_reviews.text: Got this machine for my birthday. I immediately set it up and made a cup. I love the cafe setting. It's not the same as latte from Starbucks but it does the job and the flavor is there. My wife loves the chai tea. Another good feature is that I'm able to select the size drink I'm making so my travel mug gets filled.
customer_reviews.author: Reef Maker

customer_reviews.title: better then k-cups
customer_reviews.text: i decieded to try the vue because i wanted a new coffe maker and its awesome. the flavor is great making cups for my travel cup without that watery taste is great. only bad thing i have to say is the variety of the vue cups is still low. but they are still a good price just not as big of a selection. worth buying though. went from a mini to this and im happy with the decision
customer_reviews.author: Jake G

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working 6 weeks after I received it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working 6 weeks after I received it. Keurig replaced it with new 2.0. However the coffee cups that I have cannot be used in the 2.0. Even the ones sent from Keurig do not work.
customer_reviews.author: karen e austin

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: In 32 years of marriage this may have been the best gift I ever bought my husband! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Breaks within a month
customer_reviews.text: The pump on my vue broke within a month. I googled the issue and found multiple ways to fix it, however, I should not have to be doing home repairs on such a new appliance. Don't waste your money. Buy a regular Keurig brewer. Thank goodness I kept my old one. It still works perfectly after a few years of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Helpfull Tech Support
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in perfect condition. Didn't prompt for refill of water tank until it was at about a little less than a quarter of the tank. Only problems I had was, when registering online there was a website error that prevented registering. I called the # that was listed and the lady I talked to registered it with no problem. When I received the email with the registration buy 2 get 2 pack offer the code wasn't working on the site. Called # I called before they brought confirmed the code and the items in the cart. They corrected the order price. Excellent customer support. I'm going to recommend Keurig products to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Keurig Vue
customer_reviews.text: I love it, for making hot coffee, tea, lattes or cappachinos. My only complaint is the vue doesn't have enough space under the brewer for travel mugs (even though they sell many varieties) and you can increase your cup size to 18 oz. and if you put risers under the vue it thinks that the water reserve is empty even when it's 1/2 full. I'd still buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 hours then quit. The return process ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 hours then quit. The return process with amazon was painless. We went with a chemex instead of another kuerig product.
customer_reviews.author: J Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. I get to make my coffee as strong like I like it.. Yummy!!! Kids love making their chai tea, cocoa, and cappuccinos.. Hubby loves the iced coffee
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Huff

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the keurig k cups. With this one you can make your coffee much more flavor full
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Keurig Vue!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a single cup coffee maker that could accomodate different size cups and one that I did not have to add water to everytime I wanted to make a cup of coffee. The new Keurig 2700 fits. My son can make his iced coffee with this also.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great all around brewer
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Vue I've owned. 1st one got accidentally broken. Worked awesome for the 3 years I had it. Does everything it says it'll do. 100% satisfied, with not just the product but the speed of getting it!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Krzemien

customer_reviews.title: I love 1 step brewing!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee system is awesome! I can't believe how many options I have with this machine! I can't get enough!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good but not a lot of choices in coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can brew coffee stronger or make a cappuccino, however there are not a lot of choices of flavors to choose from. The Vue coffee singles are not available in Dunkin Donut flavors and I am not able to brew my own flavor of coffee as there is not My K-Cup available.
customer_reviews.author: Marikay Nazak

customer_reviews.title: It doubles as a water saver
customer_reviews.text: Whoever said you shouldn't gift an appliance to your wife didn't know about these things. I haven't had to make coffee for myself since I got it, and what she brings me sure tastes good. As an added bonus, it's a great place to dump those half filled water bottles that seem to gather in the fridge from time to time...
customer_reviews.author: D_Man

customer_reviews.title: great but costly
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this product I went straight to tracking down all my favorite vue cups. 150 dollars and two weeks later, between myself, husband and oldest daughter I find myself needing to order more coffee. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: pandabradford

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what you are missing if you don't have one
customer_reviews.text: Always had a regular coffee maker and was primarily tea drinker because making coffee was always a hassle. Now I can make a cup in 2 minutes and choose from a ton of different flavors. No mess, quick and convenient. Probably would not be drinking coffee if I didn't have Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Loty

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful thing
customer_reviews.text: I already own a keurig but the vue is Awesome thank you very much me and my wife love it and love the The Vanilla latte And it looks good in my kitchen can't wait to Can't wait to show it off
customer_reviews.author: Abumujahid

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. It is easy to use, clean, and maintain and in her words, "the coffee is awesome". I would definitely purchase again as it arrived on time and in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anita H

customer_reviews.title: More settings
customer_reviews.text: I love my kureig, it has more settings than the k cup models, and u can use k cups I. It with an easy adapter. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cozmic

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Quit working after 2 weeks and I had to pay 26.00$ to return as this item is very heavy. Buy one locally if at all.
customer_reviews.author: keiva delaney

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Water came out smelling & tasting strongly of burnt plastic; discontinued use immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the system. Dislike the distribution of the v cup. Bought a converter to k cup...
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit about 2 months ago. Worked fine for a few cups. The pump suddenly stopped working. I get about 1/4 inch of coffee in the cup and then it just chokes. Tried to contact Keurig directly, without any success. The only thing they provide me is a stupid video on how to clean the machine. I'm like, what the heck, like I haven't tried everything in the manual. As of today, I'm still without support and not to even talk about any replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Helenius

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy, quiet, and the coffee tastes so much better with the Vue! I definitely recommend this more than the original Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: While I like and use this regularly I'm disappointed by the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: While I like and use this regularly I'm disappointed by the fact that I can't buy Vue packs locally, only through their website which is expensive. I use a K-cup adapter but the K-cup leaves a lot of residue in the bottom of the cup where the Vue packs did not.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Makes Very good Coffee. Brew Quick and makes its hot. Easy to use also. Makes Very good Coffee. Brew Quick and makes its hot. Easy to use also.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Growing pains!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine! It's tough to find vue cups at the grocery store, but the flexibility of use makes this device makes up for it. Remember, it's still new!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Sechrist

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Better than other Keurigs I've tried. Cups a little hard to find. However this should resolve itself as this model becomes more popular
customer_reviews.author: CDP1911

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that I can make up to 18 oz coffees. Also like that I can make tea & lattes & hot chocolates & iced coffees & ice tea.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Kuhlmann

customer_reviews.title: Great, when you can find it.
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is easy to make, and tastes great. The VUE cups are WAY too hard to purchase though. Come on Keurig. Make it easier to drink your coffee!!! I mean Amazon is great an all (obviously!), but sometimes I want coffee RIGHT NOW, and oops! I'm out of vue cups. All I see around me are k cups, everywhere! Solve this, and we're back in business Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Marc C. Harpster

customer_reviews.title: Overall the product works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas girt for stepfather. The box was beat up and missing sample Vue cups. Overall the product works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE NOW!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as a present to take to work and she absolutely loves it! You need to get one.
customer_reviews.author: John Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Keurig Vue
customer_reviews.text: The product works great, as advertised. Coffee varieties are not as plentiful as the regular Keurig. Also, there are not as many retail options for the new Vue coffee pods.
customer_reviews.author: kennnyd

customer_reviews.title: slow and noisy
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy when brewing and seems slow seems like it gets slower every day. Also drip tray is difficult to remove for larger cups. otherwise it is great
customer_reviews.author: SHASTA

customer_reviews.title: V700
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker but local venders of the vue cups hard to find so went to keurig web site. variety is limited compared to the K cups I look forward to improved selections
customer_reviews.author: Gobucs

customer_reviews.title: great coffee
customer_reviews.text: coffee comes out great with all your favorite flavors, also comes out real quick, in case your in a hurry
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It worked 5 days. I wouldn't give it one star if it didn't require me to.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McLain

customer_reviews.title: a Delight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine. A bit expensive for the vue cups and also difficult to find at grocery stores, but order on line and everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: ben moses

customer_reviews.title: I HATE MY KEURIG VUE
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the VUE for about a month first you can't find the vue cups for this coffee maker. Then I got up this morning & it has stopped working . I will never buy another keurig $120.00 in the trash + the money spent on the vue cups that I now have no use for this would be rates a -star if they had one
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Its didn't take long to get. The packaging was great and it was in perfect condition. It works great! I am soo happy to have this.
customer_reviews.author: suzyq

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use my Vue everyday several times and I've had no problems. I clean it once in a while with white vinegar and almost always use filtered water. I like the fact that the plastic cups are recyclable and they have a couple varieties of organic coffee. I mostly use the Sumatran Reserve and put 16 ounces of water instead of 8 ounces and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have been wanting one for a while and for a hundred bucks that was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and I love the Keurig 2700. vue. one of the best things i have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: jamie mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Awesomesauce Brewer
customer_reviews.text: Best Keurig we have owned yet. Our last model just quit working one afternoon. Easy to adapt the cups from the older model to fit into this one using the Solofill V2
customer_reviews.author: Wilkerda

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through 2 Keurig Vue V700 Machines in a two month time, they just stop working and won't brew. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gendreau

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! I am really enjoying it . Great product don't hesatiate to buy much better then the old k cup model ....
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee machine, it does it all but not for big Family of coffee drinkers.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Keurig Vue OK but...
customer_reviews.text: Makes coffee well. Was disappointed that cannot use regular K-Cups and must use Vue cups which are a little harder to find.
customer_reviews.author: topaz63

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot nicer than the original model
customer_reviews.text: It's not as noisy and there's more options for brewing coffee. I order the coffee from Walmart because it's only 11.00 per box. Will not take K cups.
customer_reviews.author: jensgear

customer_reviews.title: Better than the k-cup
customer_reviews.text: Makes all the same drinks as I had with my K-cup but since I can control the strength and oz size I get the perfect tasting cup for my needs :D super amazing! Although the vue cups are harder to find the local Bed Bath and Beyond has them all!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bieser

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Just received the new Vue and it works wonderfully. Great for the office. Same great taste, same great product. Highly recommend it for any coffee drinker.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Save hundreds a year by not going to Starbucks and Coffee Bean
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Sanshuck

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It's everything they advertise it to be, Easy to use, easy to clean and the coffee is wonderful, and you can recycle the view packs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: We love
customer_reviews.text: We are all on different schedules, four adults, nice to be able to brew a cup anytime necessary without waste.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W

customer_reviews.title: keurig 2700 vue v700
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee pot ever! Easy to use. I love that I can make the coffee as hot or cold as I want and as big or small as I want.
customer_reviews.author: dfly

customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work after the Keurig we had didn't want to brew. Like the fact that I can choose what size cup we can brew and without the K2V cup insert, we wouldn't be able to use the Kcups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: V700
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and great coffee! Timer doesn't work overseas due to voltage and hertz (mainly). I wish they had one that ran 220v for overseas while deployed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Thank you coffee gods :*)
customer_reviews.text: Finally everything I've wanted in coffee! It's quiet but still sounds like it's working hard and the coffee... ...buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda May Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. Makes a good cup of coffee fast and with no mess.I like a bold coffee. This coffee maker makes it at the temperature I like and strength I want.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ifkovits

product_meta.title: Keurig 2700 Keurig Vue V700 Single serve coffee system, 1, Black/silver
product_meta.description: The Keurig Vue V700 is Fully programmable with its color Touchscreen, Could brew from 4 ounce. up to a full size 18 ounce (Eight Sizes)Brews in under a minute and you could control the Strength and Temperature control, Removable 74 ounce water reservoir and drip tray with adjustable plate.
feature_bullets: Keurig Vue V700 Single Serve Brewing System Black
Choice of eight different cup sizes
Programmable Touchscreen for Strength & Temperature control
Keurig Vue V700 Single Serve Brewing System Black
Choice of eight different cup sizes
Programmable Touchscreen for Strength and Temperature control
